summary: Diff adds timestamp/planned-timeline fields to client-side models with normalization for legacy localStorage data, introduces date/time formatting helpers, and implements warm-themed table views for Backlog tasks and Brain Dump items including creation date/time, planned timeline, and completed time placeholder. It also adds planned timeline input to Add Task modal and records createdAt for extracted Brain Dump items. Evidence for recording completion timestamps when completing a task is not visible in the truncated FocusExecutionApp diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Capture and store completion time when a task is completed.
missing_requirements.reason: BacklogTask model includes a completedAt field and the Backlog table renders it, but the diff summary does not show any code path that sets completedAt at the moment a task is completed (FocusExecutionApp.jsx is truncated before the completion logic).
